articles.author: The Star Online
articles.title: China's Martian satellite begins remote-sensing surveys - The Star Online
articles.description: BEIJING (China Daily/Asia News Network): China's first Martian satellite-the orbiter of the Tianwen 1 mission-has started conducting remote-sensing surveys of the Red Planet, the China National Space Administration said on Monday (Nov 8).

articles.author: Katie Hunt, CNN
articles.title: Honeybees make a chilling warning noise when attacked by hive-destroying murder hornets - CNN
articles.description: Asian honeybees have evolved a unique and frenetic warning signal to communicate the danger posed by predatory giant hornets, a new study revealed.

articles.title: 4 lions at Night Safari test positive for COVID-19 after exposure to infected staff - CNA

SINGAPORE: Four Asiatic lions at the Night Safari have tested positive for COVID-19 after being exposed to infected staff from Mandai Wildlife Group.
